entry.title: Nutone - Mosquito Repellant Fixture (Black) - HVRFABL
entry.summary:
Vendor: Cheap Sprinklers
Type: Mosquito Repellant
Price: 124.38

***Product has been Discontinued - Only 4 left in stock***

Mosquito Repellent Fixture

  • One 24 ml Haven Repellent Cartridge and adaptor cap included.
  • Powder-coated, cast aluminum housing. Available in Black (BL)
  • Green LED indicator light on fixture glows when repellent system is on; flashes after 195 hours of use to indicate time to check or replace repellent cartridge.
  • 12" stem and 10" plastic ground stake included.
  • 18" leads of 18-gauge cable.
  • Works with 12v and 15v AC Transformer.

      • 12v, 1.2 amps max, 9 watts
      • 15v, 1.0 amps max, 9 watts

entry.title: Simmons - 4802LF Frost-Proof Yard Hydrant - 2' Bury
entry.summary:
Vendor: Simmons
Type: Yard Hydrants
Price: 94.98

The Frost Proof Yard Hydrant provides running water for lawn and garden, livestock and fire  protection all year, even in sub-zero temperatures. The shut-off valve operates below the frost line. Hydrant cannot freeze because when it is closed, all water in the standpipe drains out a hole in the valve which is set in the ground below the frost line. Hydrant spout operates at a convenient height (24 inches) from the ground level so that it can spill into a stock tank. Adapter (No. 8828) is threaded for 3/4'' hose. Hydrant can be easily installed anywhere water is supplied under pressure. To prevent unauthorized use, handle can be padlocked by inserting padlock into holes provided in handle and head.

Meets all Federal and state Safe Drinking Water Acts and requirements.
Does not meet California Prop. 65 (Environmental Law)

¢ 3/4'' NPT Female Inlet
¢ 3/4'' Male Hose Thread Outlet
¢ Plunger can be replaced without digging the hydrant up
¢ All components identical to 800LF Series except head casting and handle are smaller. Does not have flow lock wheel
¢ Polyester Powder Coat finish

 

Part No. Bury Depth Weight
4802LF 2
 15

 

Downloads

Hydrant Repair Instructions

entry.title: NuTone - Mosquito Repellant Refill Cartridge (Pack of 4) - HVRC4
entry.summary:
Vendor: Nutone
Type: Mosquito Repellant
Price: 139.99

Convenient protection from mosquitoes: no batteries, candles, butane, or external fuels required, no spraying to schedule, no messy traps to empty.

***This product is compatible with the new Nutone HVK400 Repellant Fixture***

Description:

  • Includes adapter cap for easy insertion into Haven fixtures
  • Fits both types of Haven fixtures
  • 24 ml of repellent provides 216 hours of protection
  • Actual hours of repellent may vary based on climate
  • Available in single pack, four pack, and eight pack
  • EPA Registration Number 1021-2618-90291
  • Haven effectively repels all types of mosquitoes, including the Aedes aegypti and Aedes albopictus mosquitoes, known carriers of the Zika virus
  • Adapter Cap included
  • Repellent Capacity of 24 ml

Downloads

  • Catalog Sheet
  • Installation Guide
  • Operating Instructions

entry.title: Melnor - Metal 4-Way Hose Valve - 9009
entry.summary:
Vendor: Melnor
Type: Hose Fittings
Price: 18.78

Too many hoses and too few faucets. The 4 Way Metal Manifold can help. This high-quality toll quickly makes 1 faucet into 4 independently controlled valves. Now you can keep all you hoses and sprinklers attached and stop constantly switching. 

  • Connects up to 4 hoses to 1 faucet
  • Each outlet individually controlled
  • Four Independent Shut-offs
  • Metal construction
  • Rubberized hose connection nut
  • For outdoor use only

entry.summary:

Type: Hose Fittings
Price: 5.98

Durable metal construction stands up to frequent use and allows more flow than standard valves for more efficient watering.

3/4'' FHT x 3/4'' MHT

Gilmour Premium Single Shutoff Connector

  • Gilmour Metal Water Shut-Off Valve This premium constructed for strength shut-off valve helps to conserve water
  • The cap type large handle resist breakage and is easy to turn
  • This product is made in China
  • Premium nylon construction for maximum strenght and durability.
  • Shut-off valve controls water flow; saves water and time.
  • Cap type valve handle resists breackage.

45% more water flow. Maximum water flow increases performance from sprinklers and nozzles. Single shut-off valve controls water flow. Extra large handles for easy grip and turn. Easy-on swivel connector.  This premium nylon constructed for strength shut-off valve helps to conserve water. The cap type large handle resist breakage and is easy to turn.

  • Dual valve controls 2 hoses from 1 faucet

entry.title: Jobes - PowerGrid Weed Barrier 3' x 100' 15YR - 52225
entry.summary:
Vendor: Jobes
Type: Weed Barrier
Price: 19.97

Perfect for permanent landscape and garden areas, the durable PowerGrid 15-Year fabric blocks sunlight and deters weeds while keeping soil moist, cool and full of nutrients. PowerGrid Premium is a lightweight, spunbonded polyester fabric ideal for weed control. Heavy-duty strength Stops weeds without chemicals Allows for flow of air, water and nutrients to soil Ideal for permanent landscape and garden areas Install when beginning projects.
 
Applications: Flower Beds, Mulched Areas, Playgrounds, Under Patios, Sidewalks and Decks.
 
  • Heavy-duty strength
  • Stops weeds without chemicals
  • Allows for flow of air, water and nutrients to soil
  • Ideal for permanent landscape and garden areas
  • Install when beginning projects

entry.title: NuTone - Light & Mosquito Repellant Timer/Controller - HVDCT
entry.summary:
Vendor: Nutone
Type: Mosquito Repellant
Price: 55.75

Allows programming of two circuits (up to four fixtures) for automatic operation, either by time of day or by Solar Sensor (Example: set lights to turn on at dusk and remain on for 5 hours; set repellent to turn on at 7 pm and off at 9 pm).

Description:

  • Enables single power supply to control two circuits independently: repellent and lighting
  • UV stabilized, high impact ABS case, in black
  • Includes back-up battery to save clock and program settings during intermittent power outage
  • Includes Solar Sensor and mounting hardware
  • Works with 12v and 15v AC transformer
  • 3 year limited warranty

Specifications:

  • Color: Black
  • Material: High Impact ABS
  • Type: Timer / Controller
  • Voltage: 12 VAC or 15 VAC
  • Warranty: 3 years
  • See fixtures for specific electrical specs

entry.title: Gilmour - 3/4'' MIPT x 3/4'' MHT Brass Double Male Connector - 877054-1002
entry.summary:
Vendor: Gilmour
Type: Hose Fittings
Price: 4.69

Gilmour exists to meet the needs of serious gardeners and homeowners who demand the very best for their lawns and gardens. Over the course of several decades, Gilmour has developed some of the most innovative tools on the market for pruning, trimming, watering, fertilizing, chemical application and cleaning. The quality of their products is unsurpassed and they make it a point to offer environmentally friendly products that help customers use natural resources responsibly. Gilmour 7MH7MP5P 3/4" x 3/4" Brass Connectors: For connection threading pipe and hose 3/4" NH x 3/4" NPT x 1/2" NPT, female ends.

FEATURES

  • Solid brass construction.
  • Connects threaded pipe and hose.
  • NH - National Hose.
  • NPT - Natural Pipe Thread.
  • Made in USA.
